text.p: Corel Corp and Netscape Communications Corp said on Monday that they had agreed to work together on a new suite of computer software applications to be released later this year.
Corel has licensed Netscape Communicator, Netscape's new suite of client software, and will "integrate it tightly" with Corel's WordPerfect Suite 8 and Corel Office Professional 8, Corel said.
Joint development will focus on combining Netscape's open-standards-based features, such as email and groupware, with Corel's desktop products, the companies said.

"Our combined efforts will produce the only desktop productivity suite that is completely open and standards-based, a concept in sharp contrast to the competition, said Michael Cowpland, Corel's president.
